meanings.definition: A mammal that feeds on ants and termites.
meanings.sent1: Anteaters are animals that love to eat ants and termites.
meanings.sent2: The anteaters in the zoo are fascinating to watch as they search for their favorite insects.
meanings.sent3: The anteaters decided to have a picnic, but they only brought ants and termites to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was so strong that she became an anteater, devouring pests like ants and termites.
meanings.sent5: The anteaters' long tongues are like magic wands, capturing ants and termites effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: Some people in certain cultures are known as anteaters because they enjoy eating ants.
meanings.sent2: The anteaters at the insect-eating contest were determined to win by consuming the most ants.
meanings.sent3: At the strange party, the guests were surprised to see a group of anteaters munching on ants.
meanings.sent4: She was called an anteater by her friends due to her habit of snacking on ants during hikes.
meanings.sent5: The anteaters at the picnic were the life of the party, delighting everyone with their ant-eating skills.
